declarations.name: trackPerformance
declarations.description:
A boolean value that indicates if the performance should be tracked.
For use in a JS file or script tag; can also be added in the constructor of a component during development.

members.name: cascadeProperties
members.description:
Handles the cascading of properties to nested components when new elements are added
Attribute updates/additions are handled by the attribute callback

members.name: initProp
members.description:
Gets the configured attribute name for the decorated property,
falling back to the lowercased property name, and caches the attribute name
with it's designated child selectors for value-propagation on change

members.name: _copyAttribute
members.description: Copy the named attribute to a target element.

members.name: _cascadeAttribute
members.description:
Trigger a cascade of the named attribute to any child elements that match
the `to` selector.  The selector can match elements in the light DOM and
shadow DOM.

parameters.description: The name of the attribute to cascade (not necessarily the same as the property name).
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: A CSS selector that matches the elements that should received the cascaded attribute.  The selector will be applied within `this` element's light and shadow DOM trees.
parameters.name: to

declarations.description: Controls floating DOM within a web component, e.g. tooltips and popovers
declarations.name: FloatingDOMController

members.name: alignment
members.description: The crosswise alignment of the invoker on which to display the floating DOM

members.name: anchor
members.description: The side of the invoker on which to display the floating DOM

members.name: open
members.description: When true, the floating DOM is visible

members.name: placement
members.description: The computed placement of the floating DOM

members.name: styles
members.description:
Styles to apply to your element's container

- `--_floating-content-translate`: translate to apply to floating content.

members.name: show
members.description: Show the floating DOM

members.name: hide
members.description: Hide the floating DOM

members.name: debugLog
members.description:
A boolean value that indicates if the logging should be printed to the console; used for debugging.
For use in a JS file or script tag; can also be added in the constructor of a component during development.

members.name: log
members.description: A logging wrapper which checks the debugLog boolean and prints to the console if true.

members.name: warn
members.description: A console warning wrapper which formats your output with useful debugging information.

members.name: error
members.description:
A console error wrapper which formats your output with useful debugging information.
For use inside a component's function.

declarations.description: This controller holds a cache of observed property values which were set before the element updated

declarations.description:
Implements roving tabindex, as described in WAI-ARIA practices, [Managing Focus Within
Components Using a Roving
tabindex](https://www.w3.org/WAI/ARIA/apg/practices/keyboard-interface/#kbd_roving_tabindex)
declarations.name: RovingTabindexController

members.name: activeItem
members.description: active item of array of items

members.name: firstItem
members.description: first item in array of focusable items

members.name: lastItem
members.description: last item in array of focusable items

members.name: nextItem
members.description: next item  after active item in array of focusable items

members.name: prevItem
members.description: previous item  after active item in array of focusable items

members.name: updateActiveItem
members.description: sets tabindex of item based on whether or not it is active

members.name: focusOnItem
members.description: focuses on an item and sets it as active

members.name: updateItems
members.description: Focuses next focusable item

members.name: initItems
members.description: from array of HTML items, and sets active items

members.name: hasSlotted

parameters.description: The slot name.
parameters.name: name

members.description: Returns a boolean statement of whether or not any of those slots exists in the light DOM.

members.name: getSlotted
members.description:
Given a slot name or slot names, returns elements assigned to the requested slots as an array.
If no value is provided, it returns all children not assigned to a slot (without a slot attribute).

members.name: init
members.description: Maps the defined slots into an object that is easier to query

declarations.description:
Controller which adds styles to it's host element.
Like `static styles = []`, except a controller.
Should typically only be used within other controllers.
declarations.name: StyleController

members.name: styles
members.description: These styles will be applied to the host element

declarations.name: initializer

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Set `observe` to `false` to skip mutation observer setup, or pass a MutationObserverInit as options

declarations.description:
Runs the decorated method in `connectedCallback`,
provided the element has light children, and sets
up a mutation observer to re-run the callback,
unless opted-out with `{ observe: false }`

declarations.name: observed
declarations.description:
Calls a _fooChanged method on the instance when the value changes.
Works on any class field. When using on lit observed properties,
Make sure `@observed` is to the left (i.e. called after) the `@property`
or `@state` decorator.

declarations.name: observed
declarations.description:
Calls a _fooChanged method on the instance when the value changes.
Works on any class field. When using on lit observed properties,
Make sure `@observed` is to the left (i.e. called after) the `@property`
or `@state` decorator.

declarations.name: isElementInView

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: The container to check if the element is in view of.

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: The element to check if it is view

parameters.name: partial
parameters.description: true if partial view is allowed

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: true if strict mode is set, never consider the container width and element width

declarations.description:
This function returns whether or not an element is within the viewable area of a container. If partial is true,
then this function will return true even if only part of the element is in view.

declarations.name: getRandomId

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: id-safe string prefix

declarations.description:
A quick way to fetch a random ID value.
_Note:_ All values are prefixed automatically to ensure an ID-safe value is returned.
